Title: A C# implementation of the GCC-PHAT algorithm
Description: a command-line tool for estimating the time delay between the two channels of a stereo signal using the Generalized Cross-Correlation Phase Transform (GCC-PHAT) technique

Title: Matlab animations
Description: Some Matlab animations of key physics and signal processing concepts

Title: File encryption and decryption
Description: a versatile command-line tool for AES file encryption
